text:
NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF EDUCATIONAL BROADCASTERS
Dr. Harry J. Skornia
ll|. Gregory Hall
University of Illinois
Urbana, Illinois
OFFICE OF THE REGIONAL DIRECT/QR
April 21, 1954
received
NftEB HEADQUARfERS
APR 2 4 1954
P M
i
Dear Harry:
Under the circumstances I think you have done a
fine preliminary job in getting the workshop and
scholarship plans and costs to Bill Griffiths. I
would question only one thing: I am not convinced
as of this moment that the shock troup team idea
will be as useful this summer and fall as you and
Iraydon have visualized it to be. I wonder how
nuch demand and time on the part of the stations
there will be for this kind of service. The idea
is a good one, however, and I am in favor of taking
a crack at it. May I repeat myself; I hope you
will be able to relieve me of the chairmanship of
this committee.
W dn
